DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a polipill improved the compliance with treatment compared to usual care that use two or more drugs,in patients at high cardiovascular risk or previous cardiovascular disease.
DOC.brief_title: Single Pill to Avert Cardiovascular Events
